JavaLog
Class LogicModule

java.lang.Object
  |
  +--JavaLog.LogicModule
Direct Known Subclasses:
IndexedLogicModule, LogicKnowledge, NotifierLogicModule, WrapperDatabase
public class LogicModule
extends java.lang.Object
implements PrologDatabase, java.io.Serializable, Observable

A logic module is composed of a set of clauses and other logic modules.

Version:
$Revision: 1.1 $ $ProjectDate: Thu, 10 Jun 1999 17:11:12 -0300 $
Author:
Ramiro Iturregui - Alejandro Zunino

Field Detail

db

protected java.util.Hashtable[] db
db contains clauses. db[i] contains clauses with head of arity i.

enable

public void enable()
Enable a logic module. An enabled logic module is part of the database and its content is available to consults.

disable

public void disable()
Disable a logic module.

active

public boolean active()
Returns the state of the logic module.
Specified by:
active in interface PrologDatabase
Returns:
true if enabled, false if disabled.

connect

public boolean connect(java.lang.String service)
Connects with a remote logic module. If service is an exported logic module, it is added (remote reference) into this logic module.
Parameters:
service - URL of an exported logic module.
Returns:
true if connect finds service.

connect

public boolean connect(java.lang.String name,
                       java.lang.String service)
Connects with a remote logic module. If service is an exported logic module, it is added (remote reference) into this logic module.
Parameters:
service - name of an exported logic module.
name - host name of the host in which logic module name lives.
Returns:
true if connect finds service at host name.

findModule

public PrologDatabase findModule(java.lang.String moduleName)

Specified by:
findModule in interface PrologDatabase
Parameters:

Returns:
